# truenas_pool (Data Source)

Fetches information about a TrueNAS storage pool.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the pool to look up.

### Read-Only

- `available_bytes` (Number) The available space in the pool in bytes.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the pool.
- `path` (String) The mount path of the pool.
- `status` (String) The status of the pool (e.g., ONLINE, DEGRADED, OFFLINE).
- `used_bytes` (Number) The used space in the pool in bytes.
